EmailTemplate.description: PD Day Follow Up Email Flagstaff AZ
EmailTemplate.name: Template - PD Day (Follow-Up) Flagstaff AZ
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for attending American Student Assistance's Arizona Professional Development Day at Flagstaff, Coconino County Community College on February 29 ,2008
It was a pleasure to see so many friendly faces.
Please contact us at training@amsa.com or 1-800-999-9080, ext. 3099 with any questions
Check our website for future training oppurtunities. http://www.amsa.com/fap/training/index.cfm
We look forward to seeing you at future ASA events.
